reviewText: Excellent!  Why Lewis isn't better known today is a mystery.  Second only to Churchill as a familiar voice of hope and inspiration during the Second World War, Lewis distinguished himself again and again as an author, teacher, scholar, apologist, etc.  A very engaging overview of his life.
as a cs lewis fan this dvd  is a great resource!
Exactly what I was looking for!

After viewing this DVD twice on loan from a friend, we couldn't resist the opportunity to purchase it for our library! C.S. Lewis (Jack) is one of our favorite authors. We learned a great deal from this DVD. We appreciate Amazon for the opportunities for good literature, movies and an assortment of enjoyable and educational materials. Frank/Louise Battles, Tyler, Texas
He was such a remarkable man teacher and author.  The biography was not only informative, but beautifully filmed.  Seeing all the places that Lewis lived , taught and wrote was an added bonus.
For those who love C.S. Lewis, this is inspiring!
